text: [Music]
if you are fortunate to have the
opportunity for instance you're a
student uh uh in college you have third
year abroad or you have a summer
internship program or you've just
graduated take the chance go to a poor
country go to a village learn about life
as it's lived by billions of people on
the planet see the challenges see the
solutions don't let the pundits who know
so little filter this reality for you go
in and experience it it will change your
life you'll understand things more
clearly you'll remain committed for life
to helping to improve the situation in
the world especially for the poorest of
the poor you'll understand the nature of
finding real solutions and no doubt
you'll make a major change in the years
ahead
